Welcome to Isha Singapore!

Congratulations on completing the recent Inner Engineering program, we hope you are enjoying your Shambhavi.

The program photos will soon be uploaded on our facebook page. Please like our facebook page to keep yourself posted.

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

We conduct monthly group meditation sessions for those initiated into Shambhavi. It is an opportunity to deepen your kriya with Sadhguru guiding you through the Shambhavi practice. You can also receive corrections for your kriya by trained Isha volunteers and enjoy powerful guided meditations and exclusive videos screened at the sessions. Please ensure to be on empty stomach. We close doors at 4.45PM sharp to ensure other meditators are not disturbed, so please ensure you are on time.

Date & Time: 8th April, 5 pm to 7:15 pm
Venue: MDIS Queenstown, Samtas Hall, 501 Stirling Rd,
Singapore 148951 (Map)
Isha Yoga (7 day) in Tamil

Guided by a trained teacher, this program also includes initiation into Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya, a powerful 21-minute inner energy process that incorporates the breath.

Date & Time:
19th & 21th April, 7pm to 9:30pm
22th, 2:30pm to 5:00pm
23rd, 7:00am to 6:00pm
24th & 25th April, 7pm to 9:30pm

Venue:
Sri Thendayuthapani Temple 15 Tank Rd, Singapore 238065

* 15 yrs and above

Isha Upa Yoga

These 5-minute processes are easy-to-practice yet potent tools to enhance health, joy, peace, love, success and inner exploration, helping one cope with the hectic pace of modern life and realize their full potential in all spheres of life.

Surya Kriya - Fire up the Sun within
 

Surya Kriya, the forefather to Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation) is a powerful process of activating the sun within you. It balances a person’s energies, leading to stability of the body and stillness of the mind. This strong foundation becomes the basis to explore higher dimensions of life.

  • Develops mental clarity and focus
  • Remedies weak constitutions
  • Balances hormonal levels in the body
  • Prepares one for deeper states of meditation

Date & Time: 29th & 30th April, 8 to 11am

Register

Yogasanas - Not Just An Exercise
 

Yogasanas are a way of aligning the inner system and adjusting it to the celestial geometry, becoming in sync with the existence, and thus naturally achieving a chemistry of healthfulness, joyfulness and blissfulness, and above all balance.

  • Relief of chronic health conditions
  • Evolution of body and mind towards a higher possibility
  • Stabilization of the body, mind, and energy system
  • Deceleration of the aging process

Date & Time: 27th & 28th Nov, 6:45 to 9:45pm
Date & Time: 29th & 30th Nov, 4:00 to 7:00pm

Register
